addGuarantor(uint256,address).details: Add a guarantor to reduce interest rate

params.guarantor: Address of the guarantor (must have high reputation)

borrow(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Borrow ETH by collateralizing circle tokens

params.collateralToken: Address of circle token to use as collateral

calculateInterestRate(uint256,uint256).details: Calculate interest rate based on reputation and guarantors

params.guarantorDiscount: Discount from guarantors in basis points

getUserLoans(address).details: Get all loans for a user

returns._0: True if loan can be liquidated

params.loanId: ID of the loan to liquidate

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.loanId: ID of the loan to repay

setTokenPrice(address,uint256).details: Set token price (oracle integration in production)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
